summary: Iteration 51 - DigitalEdu Theme Implementation Verified. Theme changed from Light Blue (sky-500) to Blue (#2563EB) to match digitaledu.net. All features working correctly: Dark sidebar with blue active states, white header with school branding, blue accent buttons, professional data tables, stat cards with progress bars, and overall professional corporate ERP look.

success_rate.backend: N/A (skipped per request - frontend only testing)

context_for_next_testing_agent: DigitalEdu theme (Blue #2563EB) implemented. Dark sidebar with gradient, white header, blue accent buttons. All pages have consistent blue theme. Previous iteration had Light Blue (sky-500) theme.

dashboard_loads.details: Dashboard loads with new DigitalEdu theme - white background, blue accents

dark_sidebar.details: Sidebar has dark theme with gradient (linear-gradient(180deg, #1E293B 0%, #0F172A 100%)) and blue active states (bg-blue-600)

white_header.details: Header is white (bg-white) with school branding, logo, and address

stat_cards_with_progress_bars.details: 4 stat cards (Total Students, Total Staff, Fee Collection, Attendance) with progress bars at bottom

quick_actions_functional.details: 4 Quick Action buttons (New Admission, Mark Attendance, Collect Fee, Ask Tino AI) - all clickable with blue/green/amber/purple colors

students_page_loads.details: Students page loads correctly with professional data table, blue 'New Admission' button, and status badges

employee_management_page_loads.details: Employee Management page loads with blue 'Add Employee' button, stat cards, and professional table

new_admission_form_opens.details: New Admission form opens with 7 tabs (Basic Info, ID & Docs, Family, Contact, Bank, Transport, Medical, Education), blue 'Admit Student' button

add_employee_form_opens.details: Add Employee form opens with 6 tabs (Basic Info, Personal, ID & Docs, Qualification, Bank & Salary, Contact, Documents), blue 'Add Employee' button

navigation_works.details: Navigation between pages works correctly - Dashboard, Students, Classes, Attendance, Employee Management, Tino AI

logout_works.details: Logout functionality works - successfully logged out and returned to login page

theme_verification.stat_card_progress_bars: Present with colored backgrounds (blue, emerald, amber, purple)
